text: Michele Relton (born 1 September 1991 in Pointe-Claire, Quebec) is a Canadian water polo player. She played for the Canadian women's national water polo team at the 2009 FINA Junior Water Polo World Championships, and 2013 World Aquatics Championships. She played for the University of the Pacific's women's water polo team. == References == Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian water polo players
title: Michele Relton
